briefTitle: OTX-15:003: A Phase 3 Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of OTX-DP for the Treatment of Ocular Inflammation and Pain After Cataract Surgery

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Has a cataract and is expected to undergo clear corneal cataract surgery with phacoemulsification and implantation of posterior chamber lens
* Has a potential post-operative pinhole corrected Snellen VA of at least 20/200 or better in both eyes

Exclusion Criteria:

* Any intraocular inflammation in the study eye present during the screening slit lamp examination
* Score greater than "0" on the Ocular Pain Assessment in the study eye at Screening
* Any intraocular inflammation in the study eye present during the screening slit lamp examination

outcomeMeasures.title: Absence of Anterior Chamber Inflammation
outcomeMeasures.description: Absence of cells (i.e., score of '0') in the anterior chamber of the study eye at Day 14

outcomeMeasures.title: Absence of Ocular Pain
outcomeMeasures.description: Absence of pain (i.e., score of '0') in the study eye at Day 8
